title: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
subtitle: Food Poisoning
series: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
tagline: Some hostels are a bargain. Others cost you your life.

synopsis.short: A health-conscious fitness influencer dies from botulism contracted from contaminated eggs at the hostel's free breakfast buffet, served by a well-meaning but criminally negligent kitchen.

death_teaser: The breakfast is included. So is the body bag.
